tittle_image.heading: MISSION
tittle_image.para: Our Mission Is to Be a Leading Manufacturer of High-Quality Rubber Products, Utilizing Innovative Technology and Sustainable Practices, While Providing Exceptional Service and Value to Our Customers. We Strive to Create a Safe and Fulfilling Work Environment for Our Employees, And to Positively Impact the Communities in Which We Operate.

products.name: Anti Vibration Rubber Pad
products.des: Antivibration rubber mounts are used to reduce vibrations and noise from mechanical equipment and HVAC applications. They are made of high-grade rubber pads that can be customized for different thicknesses and uses. They are suitable for machines that do not require bolting, such as generators, air conditioners, pumps, and fans. They also protect electronics and sensitive laboratory apparatus from excess vibrations. Antivibration rubber mounts are economical and easy to install.

products.name: Rubber Mat Connector
products.des:
Rubber Mat Connector, the ultimate solution for creating seamless and versatile flooring environments. Whether you're setting up a temporary event space, an industrial workspace, or a gym, these connectors are designed to meet your flooring needs with unmatched convenience and reliability.

Available in different sizes including 12mm, 16mm, 22mm and all other special sizes and colours.  

Key Features:
·Seamless Interlocking
·Quick Installation
·Sturdy and Durable
·Versatility
·Safety Assurance
·Easy Maintenance
·Cost-Effective


Elevate your space with the Rubber Mat Connector and experience the difference in flooring connectivity. Whether you're upgrading a commercial facility, creating a comfortable workout area, or hosting events, these connectors will ensure a polished, safe, and long-lasting flooring solution. Invest in quality, convenience, and durability today with the Rubber Mat Connector.

products.name: Rubber Ladder Shoe - Secure Footing for Elevated Work
products.des:
Introducing our Rubber Ladder Shoe, the dependable and safety-enhancing accessory designed to provide you with confidence and peace of mind when working at heights. Whether you're a professional tradesperson, a do-it-yourself enthusiast, or someone who occasionally needs to climb ladders, our Rubber Ladder Shoe is a must-have addition to your equipment.

Key Features:

·Superior Traction
·Enhanced Stability
·Quick Installation
·Durable Construction
·Versatile Compatibility
·Safety First
·Cost-Effective

Don't compromise on safety and stability when working on ladders. Elevate your work experience with the Rubber Ladder Shoe, a simple yet effective solution that ensures secure footing, reduces the risk of accidents, and enhances your overall work efficiency. Trust in the reliability of our Rubber Ladder Shoe to provide you with the confidence and stability needed for working at elevated heights. Your safety is our priority.

products.name:
Rubber Bar Mat - Elevate Your Bar Experience with Style and
Functionality
products.des:
Introducing our Rubber Bar Mat, the perfect blend of style and functionality designed to enhance your bar or beverage service area.
Crafted from high-quality rubber, this mat not only adds a touch of sophistication to your setup but also offers numerous practical benefits that both bartenders and patrons will appreciate.

Key Features:

·Anti-Slip Surface
·Easy Cleanup
·Durable and Long-Lasting
·Customizable Design
·Bar Organization
·Versatile Use
·Comfort Underfoot

Upgrade your bar with the Rubber Bar Mat and experience the benefits of a safer, more efficient, and stylish beverage service area. Whether you're a professional bartender or a home mixologist, this mat is a must-have accessory that combines functionality with aesthetic appeal. Elevate your bar experience and impress your patrons with a clean and organized bar setup using our Rubber Bar Mat.

about_des.des: Welcome to AM Rubber Industries, a leading manufacturer of high-quality rubber products. Established in 1989, we have been providing our customers with exceptional products and services for over 34 years. Our state-of-the-art manufacturing facility is located in Changanacherry, Kerala, equipped with the latest technology and machinery to ensure efficient and precise production of rubber products. We have a dedicated team of skilled professionals who are committed to delivering products that meet the highest standards of quality and safety. At AM Rubber Industries, we offer a wide range of rubber products to meet the diverse needs of our customers. Our product portfolio includes O-rings, Oil and Water Seals, Gaskets, Car Mats, Scooter Mats, Mat Connectors, Mudflaps, Bushes, Metal Bounded Rubber Products and many other custom tailored rubber products. We use the finest materials to ensure the durability and longevity of our products. At AM Rubber Industries, our mission is to exceed our customers' expectations by providing them with the best products and services. We believe in building long-term relationships with our customers based on trust and mutual respect. Thank you for considering AM Rubber Industries for your rubber product needs. We look forward to serving you.
